name: Chinese
descriptions: The Chinese minor develops Mandarin language proficiency and cultural competency through 21 hours of coursework in the Department of Modern Language Studies.

Students take 9-12 hours from language-sequence courses and 9-12 hours from Chinese or MOLA prefix courses, with at least 6 hours at the 30000 level or higher. Maximum 3 hours in English-taught courses.

courses: 9-12 hours from CHIN or MOLA prefix courses (min 6 hrs at 30000+ level, max 3 hrs in English)

electiveCourses.description: Maximum 6 credit hours may be transferred from study abroad or other universities.
